title: Deus Ex - The Fall. v1.31.ipa
description:
Deus Ex: The Fall minimum requirements: iPad 3 and above, iPad Mini, iPhone 4S and above, iPod Touch 5 and above.

NOTE: Deus Ex: The Fall requires 1.6GB free space to install. Before playing Deus Ex: The Fall, we recommend closing other applications to enhance your experience.

Deus Ex: The Fall is the start of a new journey in the award winning Deus Ex game series. Set in 2027Ã¢â‚¬â€œ the golden era for science, technology and human augmentation.
